name: code-d
description: auto-complete, snippets, linter and formatter for dlang

d.workspacedPath.description: Path of the workspace-d executable. Path can be omitted if in $PATH

d.dcdClientPath.description: Path of the dcd-client executable. Path can be omitted if in $PATH

d.dcdServerPath.description: Path of the dcd-server executable. Path can be omitted if in $PATH

d.dscannerPath.description: Path of the dscanner executable. Path can be omitted if in $PATH

d.dfmtPath.description: Path of the dfmt executable. Path can be omitted if in $PATH

d.enableLinting.description: If code-d should watch for file saves and report static analysis. Might interfere with other lint plugins or settings.

d.enableAutoComplete.description: Start dcd-server at startup and complete using dcd-client.
